description: Create or update a Shared Image Gallery.

subscription_id.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group.

gallery_name.description: The name of the Shared Image Gallery. The allowed characters are alphabets and numbers with dots and periods allowed in the middle. The maximum length is 80 characters.

gallery.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update Shared Image Gallery operation.
